basics.name: Lev Blaivas
basics.label: developer
basics.summary: 15 years experience in a wide range of projects from financial software and data mining tools, to high load web apps

work.summary: World's largest online gaming software supplier traded on the London Stock Exchange Main Market, offering cutting-edge, value added solutions to the industry's leading operators
highlights: Design and develop a highly usable, and performant cross-platform microservices framework for high load environments
Created multiple development tools used by other developers in the company
Contributed to multiple projects backed and frontend development

work.summary: Technology consulting, software development and business solutions
highlights: Responsible for the full development cycle from analysis and specification to design and development to deployment and support
Oversaw and delivered multiple mission-critical projects to clients from a wide range of industries, including pharmaceutical, shipping, financial, law and others.

work.summary: Development and maintenance of accounting and POS software
highlights: Developing missing-creitical accounting and POS software solutions

interests.name: Chess
